title: ADVISORY Background Briefing Call to Discuss Recovery Act Progress Report | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 13, 2009

 



ADVISORY Background Briefing Call to Discuss Recovery Act Progress Report




THE WHITE HOUSE    Office of the Vice President    ________________________________________________________________ FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                    May 13, 2009   Background Briefing Conference Call with Senior Administration Official on Vice President’s Quarterly Report to the President on Recovery Act Progress WASHINGTON – Today the Vice President’s office will hold a background briefing conference call with a senior administration official to discuss the Vice President’s first quarterly report to the President on progress implementing the Recovery Act.                              WHEN:               TODAY, Wednesday, May 13, 2009                             12:45 PM ET             HOW:                 Email press@ovp.eop.gov for dial-in information ###
